thread.section_title: Bariatric Choice Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bariatric Choice | www.bariatricchoice.com
thread.title: Christopher Casey
thread.title_full: Bariatric Choice reviewed by Christopher Casey

author: Christopher Casey
title: Christopher Casey
text: My first visit to the Bariatric Choice site.. I was immediately impressed with the clean feel and ease of use of the site. Great product choices and some good bargains to be had. The best part of all was that Megan popped up in a chat window and was able to answer a few questions and help with a coupon code that I was trying to apply to my account. She also told me I was eligible for two free boxes of protein bars which is what I went to the site for. I couldn't be happier with the experience and am grateful for the helpful and courteous customer service offered by Megan. I'll be back!
